bug.author: fsx950223
bug.description:
Thank you for submitting a TensorFlow documentation issue. Per our GitHub policy, we only address code/doc bugs, performance issues, feature requests, and build/installation issues on GitHub. The TensorFlow docs are open source! To get involved, read the documentation contributor guide: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs>https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
tensorflow/tensorflow/python/ops/linalg_ops.py
Line 426 in 1cf0898
@tf_export('norm', 'linalg.norm', v1=[])
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
I can't find tensorflow.linalg.norm on official v2.0 API document

comments.comment: Because is same as , the documentation is shared with <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/norm>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/norm</denchmark-link>

Because tf.linalg.norm is same as tf.norm, the documentation is shared with tf.norm https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/norm
Thanks
